text: The Tomb of Khajeh Rabie dates back to the Safavid dynasty and is located in Mashhad, at the end of Khajeh Rabie Street. == Gallery == File:آرامگاه خواجه ربیع (1).jpg File:DSCN1840nnn.jpg File:مقبره خواجه ربیع.jpg File:DSCN1836ww.jpg File:Khaj rabi 6.jpg File:Khaj rabi 3.jpg File:Mahdi11hashemi11.jpg File:عکس از آرامگاه خواجه ربیع (کاشی کاری زیبای بقعه) در مشهد Khajeh Rabi' Mausoleum.jpg == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Mashhad Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Tourist attractions in Razavi Khorasan Province
title: Tomb of Khajeh Rabie
